login.title: User Center
login.maxLength: username is no more than 100 characters
login.pwdMaxLength: password length not more than 19 characters
login.note: Due to the recent rampant attacks on database collisions, please do not use the same or similar usernames and passwords as other websites in this system. If your username and password on this system are leaked due to your deliberate or negligent negligence, right The impact caused by the business is borne by you.
